titleStmt.title: The healing paper, or, A Catholick receipt for union between the moderate bishop & sober non-conformist, maugre all the aversation of the unpeaceable by a follower of peace, and lover of sincerity.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Humfrey. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
